##07/19/22

If we do random iterations with input reads what do we get? combined replicates
Merge input column by read
```{r}
setwd("/fastscratch/uma/CENPA_ChIP/clumpify/")

B6_F_092920_input <- read.delim(file = "clumpify_fastp_B6_F_092920_input.fastq.readscore.txt",header = FALSE)
B6_M_input <- read.delim(file = "clumpify_fastp_B6_M_input.fastq.readscore.txt",header = FALSE)

B6 <- merge(B6_F_092920_input,B6_M_input, by = "V1", all = FALSE)

rm(B6_F_092920_input)
rm(B6_M_input)

setwd("/fastscratch/uma/CENPA_ChIP/clumpify/")

CAST_F_011921_input <- read.delim(file = "clumpify_fastp_CAST_F_011921_input.fastq.readscore.txt",header = FALSE)
CAST_M_011921_input <- read.delim(file = "clumpify_fastp_CAST_M_011921_input.fastq.readscore.txt",header = FALSE)
CAST_M_101620_input <- read.delim(file = "clumpify_fastp_CAST_M_101620_input.fastq.readscore.txt",header = FALSE)

CAST <- merge(CAST_M_101620_input,CAST_M_011921_input, by = "V1", all = FALSE)
CAST <- merge(CAST, CAST_F_011921_input, by = "V1", all = FALSE)

rm(CAST_F_011921_input)
rm(CAST_M_011921_input)
rm(CAST_M_101620_input)

setwd("/fastscratch/uma/CENPA_ChIP/clumpify/")
LEWES_F_011921_input <- read.delim(file = "clumpify_fastp_LEWES_F_011921_input.fastq.readscore.txt",header = FALSE)
LEWES_M_011921_input <- read.delim(file = "clumpify_fastp_LEWES_M_011921_input.fastq.readscore.txt",header = FALSE)
LEWES_F_012621_input <- read.delim(file = "clumpify_fastp_LEWES_F_012621_input.fastq.readscore.txt",header = FALSE)

LEWES <- merge(LEWES_F_011921_input,LEWES_M_011921_input, by = "V1", all = FALSE)
LEWES <- merge(LEWES, LEWES_F_012621_input, by = "V1", all = FALSE)

rm(LEWES_F_011921_input)
rm(LEWES_M_011921_input)
rm(LEWES_F_012621_input)

PWK_F_012621_input <- read.delim(file = "clumpify_fastp_PWK_F_012621_input.fastq.readscore.txt",header = FALSE)
PWK_F_092920_input <- read.delim(file = "clumpify_fastp_PWK_F_092920_input.fastq.readscore.txt",header = FALSE)
PWK_M_101620_input <- read.delim(file = "clumpify_fastp_PWK_M_101620_input.fastq.readscore.txt",header = FALSE)

PWK <- merge(PWK_F_012621_input,PWK_F_092920_input, by = "V1", all = FALSE)
PWK <- merge(PWK, PWK_M_101620_input, by = "V1", all = FALSE)

rm(PWK_F_012621_input)
rm(PWK_F_092920_input)
rm(PWK_M_101620_input)
```

```{r}
setwd("/projects/dumont-lab/uma/CENPA_ChIP/readscore")
write.table(B6, file = "B6_input_Readcount.txt", row.names = FALSE, quote = FALSE, sep = "\t")
write.table(CAST, file = "CAST_input_Readcount.txt", row.names = FALSE, quote = FALSE, sep = "\t")
write.table(LEWES, file = "LEWES_input_Readcount.txt", row.names = FALSE, quote = FALSE, sep = "\t")
```

Extract first column from readcount file
```{bash}
cd /fastscratch/uma/CENPA_ChIP/clumpify

for file in *_input_Readcount.txt; do
awk -F '\t' '{print $1}' $file > $file.firstcol
done
```

Run stylo on all input reads
```{r}
top1000.corpus <- load.corpus(files = "all", 
                              corpus.dir = "/projects/dumont-lab/uma/CENPA_ChIP/readscore/stylo_input/all_reads",
                              encoding = "UTF-8")

corpus.words.1.grams <- txt.to.features(top1000.corpus, 
                                        ngram.size = 1,
                                        features = "w")

frequency.list <- make.frequency.list(corpus.words.1.grams)

frequency.list.value <- make.frequency.list(corpus.words.1.grams, value = TRUE)

frequency.list.table <- make.table.of.frequencies(corpus.words.1.grams, features = frequency.list)



```


Plots - too large, getting stuck
```{r}
stylo(frequencies = frequency.list.table, 
      analysis.type = "PCR",
      custom.graph.title = "Input Strain Variation",
      mfw.min = 1000, mfw.max = 1000,
      write.png.file = TRUE, 
      gui = FALSE)
```

Make 1000 subsamples
```{bash}
for file in *_input_Readcount.txt.firstcol; do

for i in {1..1000}; do

shuf -n 1000 /projects/dumont-lab/uma/CENPA_ChIP/readscore/${file} > /projects/dumont-lab/uma/CENPA_ChIP/readscore/stylo_input/rep${i}/${file}.sample${i}.txt

done

done
```

Run stylo on each replicate and save df
```{r,echo=FALSE}
for (i in 1:1){

   corpusdirectory <- paste("/projects/dumont-lab/uma/CENPA_ChIP/readscore/stylo_input/rep", i, sep = "")

   top1000.corpus <- load.corpus(files = "all",
                              corpus.dir = corpusdirectory,
                              encoding = "UTF-8")
   corpus.words.1.grams <- txt.to.features(top1000.corpus,
                                        ngram.size = 1,
                                        features = "w")
   frequency.list <- make.frequency.list(corpus.words.1.grams)
   frequency.list.value <- make.frequency.list(corpus.words.1.grams, value = TRUE)
   frequency.list.table <- make.table.of.frequencies(corpus.words.1.grams, features = frequency.list)

   PCA <- stylo(frequencies = frequency.list.table,
      analysis.type = "PCR",
      custom.graph.title = "Strain Variation",
      mfw.min = 4004, mfw.max = 4004,
      gui = FALSE)

   PCAcoord <- as.data.frame(PCA$pca.coordinates)
   PCAcoord$STRAIN <- rownames(PCAcoord)
   PCAcoord %>%
      pivot_longer(-STRAIN, names_to = "sample", values_to = "PCaxis") -> PCAcoord

   PCAname <- paste("PCA", i, sep = "")
   assign(PCAname, PCAcoord)

   CA <- stylo(frequencies = frequency.list.table,
      analysis.type = "CA",
      custom.graph.title = "Strain Variation Cluster",
      mfw.min = 4004, mfw.max = 4004,
      gui = FALSE)
  
   PCAcoord <- as.data.frame(PCA$pca.coordinates)
   PCAcoord$STRAIN <- rownames(PCAcoord)
   PCAcoord %>%
      pivot_longer(-STRAIN, names_to = "sample", values_to = "PCaxis") -> PCAcoord

   PCAname <- paste("PCA", i, sep = "")
   assign(PCAname, PCAcoord)

   CA <- stylo(frequencies = frequency.list.table,
      analysis.type = "CA",
      custom.graph.title = "Strain Variation Cluster",
      mfw.min = 4004, mfw.max = 4004,
      gui = FALSE)

   CAdist <- as.data.frame(CA$distance.table)
   CAdist$STRAIN <- rownames(CAdist)
   CAdist %>%
      pivot_longer(-STRAIN, names_to = "sample", values_to = "dist") -> CAdist

   CAname <- paste("CA", i, sep = "")
   assign(CAname, CAdist)

}

```

```{r,echo=FALSE}
for (i in 2:1000){

   corpusdirectory <- paste("/projects/dumont-lab/uma/CENPA_ChIP/readscore/stylo_input/rep", i, sep = "")

   top1000.corpus <- load.corpus(files = "all",
                              corpus.dir = corpusdirectory,
                              encoding = "UTF-8")
   corpus.words.1.grams <- txt.to.features(top1000.corpus,
                                        ngram.size = 1,
                                        features = "w")
   frequency.list <- make.frequency.list(corpus.words.1.grams)
   frequency.list.value <- make.frequency.list(corpus.words.1.grams, value = TRUE)
   frequency.list.table <- make.table.of.frequencies(corpus.words.1.grams, features = frequency.list)

   PCA <- stylo(frequencies = frequency.list.table,
      analysis.type = "PCR",
      custom.graph.title = "Strain Variation",
      mfw.min = 4004, mfw.max = 4004,
      gui = FALSE)

   PCAcoord <- as.data.frame(PCA$pca.coordinates)
   PCAcoord$STRAIN <- rownames(PCAcoord)
   PCAcoord %>%
      pivot_longer(-STRAIN, names_to = "sample", values_to = "PCaxis") -> PCAcoord

   PCA1 <- rbind(PCA1, PCAcoord)

   CA <- stylo(frequencies = frequency.list.table,
      analysis.type = "CA",
      custom.graph.title = "Strain Variation Cluster",
      mfw.min = 4004, mfw.max = 4004,
      gui = FALSE)

   CAdist <- as.data.frame(CA$distance.table)
   CAdist$STRAIN <- rownames(CAdist)
   CAdist %>%
      pivot_longer(-STRAIN, names_to = "sample", values_to = "dist") -> CAdist

   CA1 <- rbind(CA1, CAdist)

}
```

#######Edit before running
Make distributions
```{r}
setwd("/projects/dumont-lab/uma/CENPA_ChIP/readscore/")
CAiter <- read.table(file = 'CA_RandomSample_1000_input_replicates_woconsensus.txt')
```

```{r}
CAiter_sep <- separate(data = CAiter, col = STRAIN, into = c("clumpify","fastp","strain", "sex","replicate","rand"), sep = "_")

CAiter_sep <- CAiter_sep[,c(3,4,5,7,8)]

CAiter_sep <- separate(data = CAiter_sep, col = sample, into = c("clumpify","fastp","strain2", "sex2","replicate2","rand2"), sep = "_")

CAiter_sep <- CAiter_sep[,c(1,2,3,6,7,8,10)]

CAiter_sep$replicate = sub("input.fastq.readscore.txt.firstcol.sample\\d{1,4}", "092920", CAiter_sep$replicate)

CAiter_sep$replicate2 = sub("input.fastq.readscore.txt.firstcol.sample\\d{1,4}", "092920", CAiter_sep$replicate2)

CAiter_sep$SAMPLE1 <- paste(CAiter_sep$strain, CAiter_sep$sex, CAiter_sep$replicate, sep="_")
CAiter_sep$SAMPLE2 <- paste(CAiter_sep$strain2, CAiter_sep$sex2, CAiter_sep$replicate2, sep="_")

CAiter_sep <- CAiter_sep[,c(8,9,7)]
colnames(CAiter_sep) <- c("strain","strain2","dist")

```
